history.proof: intros. unfold Included in H. unfold Included. intros x0 H1. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros T F G H x H0.
intros T' F G H x H0.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x : Ensemble T, In F x -> In G x" on hypothesis of type "In (FamilyUnion F) x0".

original: intros T F G H x H0. unfold Included in H. unfold Included. intros x0 H1. apply H in H1. apply family_union_intro with x. apply H1. auto.
